description: Replacement of the house's existing front and rear windows and front roof light, two storey side infill extension rear roof light and first floor rear window, rear roof dormer extension rear windows and existing single storey rear infill extension and single storey rear extension roofs and rear doors and windows.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications:  EX00; EX01; EX02; EX03; EX04; EX05; EX06 (Rev A); EX07; EX08; EX09; P01; P02; P03; P04; P05; P06 (Rev A); P07; P08; P09  Received:  05 December 2023;  Unreferenced Location Plan  Received:  25 September 2023.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used for the replacement of the house and its existing two storey side infill extension, rear roof dormer extension, single storey rear infill extension and single storey rear extension's selected windows, doors and roof lights, as indicated in the submitted drawings received on 05 December 2023 numbered EX00; EX01; EX02; EX03; EX04; EX05; EX06 (Rev A); EX07; EX08; EX09; P01; P02; P03; P04; P05; P06 (Rev A); P07; P08; P09 and on 25 September 2023 numbered Unreferenced Location Plan and hereby approved, shall match their existing materials, colours and design detailing and include the permanent retention and reinstallation of the house's existing third floor front roof gable front windows, first floor front glazed doors and first and ground floor front bay windows' red, blue and yellow glazed feature fanlights.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the altered two storey side infill extension, rear roof dormer extension, single storey rear infill extension and single storey rear extension hereby approved.
